participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.background: Chocolate is my favorite food. I am learning how to play the piano. I geocache in my spare time. I am a school psychologist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: I am a small business owner. I help them win a lot of money. I have a consulting firm. My clients are gamblers. I give out sports information.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for a living?
I'm a small business owner. I have a consulting firm that helps gamblers win a lot of money.
That's interesting! What kind of information do you give out?
I give out sports information, like who's going to win the game, how many points they're going to score, and so on.
That must be really interesting! Do you ever get nervous when you're giving out information?
Not really. I'm pretty confident in my ability to predict the outcomes of games.
That's good! I'm not so good at predicting the outcomes of games. I'm more of a gambler than a sports fan.
That's okay. I'm sure you're good at something else.
Thanks! I like to think so. What's your favorite thing about being a small business owner?
I love the freedom it gives me. I can set my own hours and work on my own projects.
That sounds great! I've always wanted to be a small business owner.
It's definitely a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm definitely going to keep it in mind as a career option.
That's great! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
